meanings.sent1: The puppy was the cutesiest in the litter.
meanings.sent2: She picked out the cutesiest dress for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cutesiest kitten tried to climb the stairs but kept slipping.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as cutesiest as a basket of puppies.
meanings.sent5: The cutesiest baby giggled and clapped its hands in delight.

meanings.definition: In a cute or adorable manner.
meanings.sent1: She smiled cutesiest when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent2: The little girl danced cutesiest at the recital.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail cutesiest when given a treat.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed cutesiest in the spring sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The baby laughed cutesiest while playing peek-a-boo.
